    Block explorers

    Blockchain explorers permit easy navigation through a blockchain's blocks, transactions, addresses, contracts, etc.

    Ethereum and L2s

    • Etherscan
    • Optimistic Etherscan (Optimism)
    • Arbiscan (Arbitrum)
    • zkScan (zkSync)
    • Boba explorer (Boba)
    • Hermez Batch Explorer (Polygon Hermez)
    • Metis andromeda explorer (Metis)
    • Aztec network block explorer (Aztec)
    • Loopring zkRollup explorer (Loopring)
    • ZKSpace explorer (zkSwap)
    • Starknet explorer (Starknet)

    Polygon

    • PolygonScan

    Gnosis chain (formerly xDai)

    • Blockscout

    Bitcoin

    • Blockchain.com explorer
    • BTC.com explorer
    • Blockstream
    • BlockCypher

    Other EVM-compatible chains

    • FTMScan (Fantom)
    • Snowtrace (Avalanche)
    • CronosScan (Cronos, Crypto.com)
    • BscScan (Binance Smart Chain, Binance)
    • Hooscan (Hoo)
    • HecoInfo (Heco, Huobi)
    • Moonscan (Moonbeam)
    • Moonriver block explorer (Moonriver)

    Multi purpose

    • Blockchair
    • Blockscan

    Polkadot, Kusama and parachains

    • Polkascan-Polkadot
    • Polkascan-Kusama
    • Subscan.io

    Cardano

    • Cardano.org block explorer
    • Cardanoscan.io

    Solana

    • Solana.com block explorer
    • Solscan
